title: Messaging Services

Messaging Services







Hey there! Seems like you are still using the documentation of our legacy Java repository. Since it wonâ€™t be maintained anymore, we recommend you to checkout the new Java page here.





Messaging Services provide an asynchronous communication mechanism between applications. Technically this is implemented using Apache Kafka .


For spring, devonfw uses Spring-Kafka as kafka framework.
For more details, check the devon4j-kafka.


For quarkus, follow Quarkus - Kafka Reference Guide.
